option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Type-Jam: Master the Keys
A typing practice game built with JavaFX.
## For Users
**Download:** `Type-Jam-Windows-Setup.zip` (58 MB)
**How to Install:** 1. Extract the ZIP file 2. Open the `Type-Jam` folder 3. Double-click `Type-Jam.exe`
✅ No Java installation required!
## ️ For Developers
### Build the Project ```powershell .\build-simple.ps1 ```
### Create Windows App ```powershell .\create-installer.bat ```
### Create Distribution ZIP ```powershell .\create-distribution-zip.ps1 ```
## System Requirements - Windows 10 or higher - 4 GB RAM - 200 MB disk space
## Project Structure - `src/` - Source code - `target/` - Build output - `Type-Jam-Portable/` - JAR version (requires Java 17+) - `installer-output/` - Windows app - `Type-Jam-Windows-Setup.zip` - Ready to share!
---
**Version:** 1.0 **Java:** 17 **JavaFX:** 21.0.2
